comment.author: 57436006@N06
comment._content: A nice 1970's image.  I find it interesting that the adult male is also wearing "flares".  Where I come from he would have been considered an old guy trying to look young.

comment.author: 84731659@N00
comment._content: Fascinating stuff... at first I thought the photo was taken in the 1930s, then I noticed the boy is wearing bell bottoms!

comment.author: 30817808@N00
comment._content: Great very 'Steptoe & Son' when the tv series ran?

comment.author: 52447457@N02
comment._content: Absolutely love this. Street photography at it's peak. "Oi, tinker. Fancy posing for a few minutes while I get set up and if you don't mind, put your best menacing face on?" . I  could imagine doing that now with a couple of grands worth of stuff strapped to your back in the current climate?
